Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Constance
ShortDescription: #79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Stony Island, 76th, Jeffrey and 79th due to fire department activity near 79th/Constance.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Stony Island, 76th, Jeffrey, then resume their normal route on 79th.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to fire department activity near 79th/Constance.

Headline: #3 King Drive and #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Southbound Reroute near 95th/Michigan
ShortDescription: Southbound 3 King Drive and 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted, due to: street blockage near 95th/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #3 King Drive and #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, 100th, State, and resume normal route due to, street blockage near 95th/Michigan.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
